attributes.action: Lewis Hamilton F1 world Champion should be awarded a Knighthood.
attributes.background: Lewis Hamilton is a 4 time world champion and the greatest British racing driver of all time. He is an ambassador for the UK and an inspiration to children and adult alike.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
